projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: RoyalStay -  Visa & Hotel website
projects.bodyText:
- The RoyalStay website coded with **FastApi**. Hotel providers can sell their hotel and visa specifically for **Dubai**.
 - **React** framework is used for its frontend.
 - Deployed on a local ubuntu server so sometiimes it is down

projects.title: Domino matrix
projects.bodyText:
- A code that give you the minimum number of dominoes you should fell in matrix structure to start a domino effect.
 - The program is fully coded with **Python** and the **Logic** is noteworthy.
